title: 2.0.1 Update
content:
This update brings back features that we simply didn't add back in the new `2.0.0` series. We hope to keep making updates like this while we continue to have missing features. It can be found here: https://bit.ly/2rx3eTm.

Merry Christmas!

title: Merry Christmas
content:
This blog post is automated to release on Dec 25th, 2019 (Christmas) at 00:00 GMT-10:00 so that I can just say thanks to you guys on this very merry Christmas day for supporting me. You _probably_ received my gift already, however, since this is written in the past I wouldn't know. I'm having fun making this blog system and it supports `markdown`!

Merry Christmas!
